title: 3 Clicks to a Kubernetes Cluster with NetApp
description:
Join us for an interactive session on application development, deployment and the delivery of persistent storage in cloud native environments through NetApp Kubernetes Service. Through demos and live Q&A we’ll: 
Create and manage production–ready Kubernetes clusters and automate the dev lifecycle: code commit to running app
Demonstrate enterprise container registry management with consistent cross-cloud experience from a single pane of glass
Deliver a simplified dev lifecycle using NetApp application management platform

fulltitle: 3 Clicks to a Kubernetes Cluster with NetApp
